document_data.mainbody:
Bandores were bass-range musical instruments similar to citterns.
The sound of the bandore was rich and mellow, and it was capable of reaching lower notes than usual citterns which made them good accompanying instruments for quieter voices. Bandores typically had scalloped sides that were said to enrich their sound. They were available for purchase through Auroras Whole Realms Catalogue.
 Fochlucan bandore  One of the seven Instruments of the Bards. Magical bandores that contained nature-based magic, as well as other magical powers.
* Bonnie Harper, a member of the bardic group Adagio Jones and The Goodwinds, had a bandore that she played for mock music and songs that involved the groups string ensemble.
